title: Non-derivatizing solvent assisted waste-derived cellulose/ MOF composite porous matrix for efficient metal ion removal: comprehensive analysis of batch and continuous packed-bed column sorption studies
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,20254-20277
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02566K, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Anil Kumar K., Mohan Jujaru, Jitendra Panwar, Suresh Gupta
The synthesis of highly efficient calcium-based metal–organic framework (Ca-MOF) immobilized cellulose beads is crucial for the removal of hazardous heavy metal ions in both batch and continuous packed-bed column sorption studies.
